SELECT sc.cart_id AS cartId, ps.sku_name AS skuName, ps.sku_status AS skuStatus, ps.attributes AS attributes, ps.product_price AS productPrice, sc.quantity AS quantity, ps.product_id AS productId, ps.sku_id AS skuId, sc.customer_id AS customerId, pp.pic_small AS picSmall, pp.pic_big AS picBig FROM shopping_cart sc LEFT JOIN product_sku ps ON sc.sku_id = ps.sku_id LEFT JOIN product_pic pp ON ps.product_id = pp.product_id WHERE sc.customer_id = #{customerId}
